Name: aclonifen production | aclonifen | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/202:Manufacture of other chemical products/2021:Manufacture of pesticides and other agrochemical products
Description: Aclonifen  is a pesticide produced in four steps from o-dichlorobenzene :;C6H4Cl2 + Cl2 → C6H3Cl3 + HCl;C6H3Cl3 + HNO3 → C6H2Cl3NO2 + H2O;C6H2Cl3NO2 + NH3 → C6H4Cl2N2O2 + HCl;C6H4Cl2N2O2 + C6H5ONa → C12H9ClN2O3 + NaCl;A precursor that is used for the aclonifen production is sodium phenolate (C6H5ONa). Sodium phenolate (C6H5ONa) is produced from phenol and sodium hydroxide :;C6H6O + NaOH → C6H5ONa + H2O
